thread.title: Houston to Host Spectacular Womens History Month Celebration Featuring Victory Brinker, Montoia Murray, Dr. Tiana Von Johnson | FinancialContent Business Page
thread.title_full: Houston to Host Spectacular Womens History Month Celebration Featuring Victory Brinker, Montoia Murray, Dr. Tiana Von Johnson | FinancialContent Business Page

author: GlobePRwire
title: Houston to Host Spectacular Womens History Month Celebration Featuring Victory Brinker, Montoia Murray, Dr. Tiana Von Johnson | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
Houston, TX - Women's History Month in Houston is set to be an extraordinary affair, as the city prepares to host a celebration like no other. On March 24, 2024, at a Private Location. Houstonians will gather to honor and celebrate phenomenal women from all walks of life.Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee will receive the Living Legends Award.
Headlining the event is the sensational Victory Brinker, whose remarkable vocal talent has captured the hearts of audiences worldwide. At just 12, Victory has already made history as the youngest opera singer in the Guiness Book of World Records and her mesmerizing voice promises to enchant and inspire all in attendance.
Joining Victory Brinker on stage will be Montoia Murray, the MLK Oratory Winner, whose eloquent words and powerful message have earned her acclaim and admiration. Montoia's impassioned speeches have ignited change and hope in communities across the nation, making her a fitting addition to the lineup of speakers at this prestigious event.
Dr. Tiana Von Johnson, renowned entrepreneur and motivational speaker, will also take the stage to share her insights on "Unlocking Your Millionaire Mind and Branding Your Brilliance." Dr. Johnson's expertise in business and branding has empowered countless individuals to achieve success and realize their full was potential.
Hosting the annual celebration will be none other than Dr. Sonia White, a USAF Veteran and Chief Editor/Founder of the WOW Magazine. Dr. White's dedication to honoring and uplifting women has made her a respected figure in the community, and her leadership ensures that this event will be nothing short of spectacular.
Keynote speaker Dr. Jacqueline Mohair will deliver a powerful address. Master of Ceremony State Rep. Ron Reynolds and Emcee/Honoree, Dr Twiler Portis will guide guests through an evening of celebration and inspiration. Special guest speakers include Dr. Ni’Cola Mitchell Founder of “Girls Who Brunch Tour”is a Best-Selling author who made the Forbes List as a Change Maker. Dr. Ni’Cola was featured with her own Lifetime movie, “Giving Hope: The Ni’Cola Mitchell Story”. This will be a spectacular and historical event celebrating Women’s History Month. Winners of the World Global Magazine is set to inspire and share stories of incredible men and women. Subscribe and support winnersoftheworld.com @wowglobalmag IG and Facebook.
"We are thrilled to bring together such a talented and diverse lineup of speakers and performers for this year's Women's History Month Celebration," said Dr. Sonia White. "This event is an opportunity to honor the achievements and contributions of women throughout history, and to inspire future generations to dream big and achieve their goals."
